attributes.action: force Local Authorities to provide recycling facilities for small businesses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Small businesses have to pay for disposal of packaging and other waste, most of which is recyclable; paper, card, metal, wood, glass etc. 

These costs are are a heavy burden on small businesses.

Free facilities exist for domestic recycling but not for businesses. If small businesses were allowed to use these facilities recycling rates would increse and landfill would reduce dramatically.
